text:
you could take a look at BioMakie.jl, I have a simple structure viewer for protein structures working right now using makie. I am in the process of adding a lot more to it, including a bunch of sequence stuff, and web representations/interaction. Feel free to contribute new stuff or changes! :slightly_smiling_face:
I am plotting the structures as meshscatters with cylinder meshes for the bonds
